tools.name: create_ticket
tools.description: Create a new IT support ticket. Use this when the caller describes an IT issue that needs to be tracked.

caller_id.description: Identifier for the caller (session ID or hashed phone number)

issue_description.description: Clear description of the IT issue the caller is experiencing

tools.name: get_ticket_status
tools.description: Retrieve the current status and details of an existing ticket. Use this when the caller asks about a ticket they previously created.

tools.name: add_ticket_comment
tools.description: Add additional information or updates to an existing ticket. Use this when the caller provides more details about their issue.

comment.description: The additional information or update to add to the ticket

tools.name: list_recent_tickets
tools.description: List recent tickets for a specific caller. Use this when the caller asks to see their previous tickets or ticket history.
